attributes.action: Allow Exercise Classes to take place in all tiers if gyms can be open
attributes.additional_details: Gyms can remain open but classes cannot.  Gyms have put in stringent measures to ensure people do not mix in classes and stand on an allocated spot.  No equipment needs to be touched. People wear masks until reaching a spot and stay on it.
attributes.background: Allow gyms and exercise classes to remain open in all Tier categories.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555618
